context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: explore all possible options, such as seeking financial assistance from family, friends, or charity organizations
consult healthcare professionals, pharmaceutical companies, or look for patient assistance programs which may offer the medication at a reduced cost or free of charge
explore different funding options
explore various options to secure the medication
reach out to NGOs, charitable trusts, or philanthropic organizations that provide financial aid or assistance to individuals who are unable to afford necessary medications
consult with her doctor for alternative or generic versions of the medication that might be less expensive
consult her doctor or a pharmacist for possible alternative treatments or medications that are less expensive but can still provide the same effects
explore all possible options to collect the required funds
research if there are any programs, charities, or foundations that assist with the costs of such medications

explore all available options such as consulting a different physician for a potential lower-cost alternative, applying for pharmaceutical assistance programs, starting a crowdfunding campaign, and negotiating the price with the pharmacy or drug manufacturer

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hailing service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible while also contacting a tow truck or roadside assistance service for his broken down car
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride service to ensure he makes it to the airport on time
call a taxi, Uber, or any available ride service to take him to the airport
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi or a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as quickly as possible
contact a taxi service or use a ride-sharing app like Uber or Lyft to get a quick ride to the airport
call a taxi, Uber or a friend to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any other rideshare service to quickly transport him to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: thoroughly recheck all the sales and cash transactions made throughout the day
check the sales receipts and compare it with the cash in the register to see if there was an error in recording the transactions
carefully double-check his calculations and recount the money in the register to ensure there hasn't been a counting error
check the security camera footage, if possible, to see if there was a mishandling of funds or if someone stole the money
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery immediately to report the missing money
investigate the situation
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery to report the discrepancy
look at the security footage to see if any customers or employees took money from the register, or if there was an error made during any transactions
contact his supervisor and report the missing money immediately
immediately report the missing money to his superior and carefully check all cash receipts and sales records of the day to identify any discrepancies or errors

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary should do is to
generation: contact her mom to bring the assignment to school if possible
contact her teacher immediately
email her teacher or talk to him/her before class explaining the situation
talk to her teacher, explain the situation and ask if she can bring the assignment the next day or send a picture or scan of it via email
immediately approach her teacher before class begins, explain the situation with honesty and ask if she could bring the assignment the next day or send an electronic copy later, if possible
explain the situation to her teacher as soon as she can
immediately contact her teacher to explain the situation
explain the situation honestly to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the assignment
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework
contact her mother immediately and explain the situation, ask her to either drop it off at school or send a picture of the completed assignment that she could show to her teacher

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put and build a shelter to conserve body heat
stay in a single location, preferably in a visible and sheltered spot
stay in one place
stay in one place and try to create a visible signal for rescuers, either by creating a large marking on the ground or by starting a controlled fire if possible
stay put and not wander further into wilderness
stay in one place to make it easier for the rescue team to find them
stay put, and try to build a shelter with insulation to protect the group from the cold
stay close to his current location, set up a shelter, and try to make a signal (like a fire or a bright piece of fabric) to alert potential rescuers
stay put and build a shelter
stay where they are
